com.compendium.core.db
Class DBLink

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.db.DBLink

public class DBLink
extends java.lang.Object

The DBLink class serves as the interface layer between the RLink objects and the Link table in the database.

                          java.lang.String toId,
                          java.lang.String sLabel,
                          int nArrow)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
Inserts a new link in the database and returns it.

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
linkId, - the link id.
creationDate, - the date of creation of the link.
modificationDate, - the date of modification of the link.
author, - the author of this link.
type, - the type of this link.
sImportedID, - the id of the link if importing.
sOriginalID, - the original id of this link.
fromId, - the source node of this link.
toId, - the destination node of this link.
sLabel, - the label of this link.
nArrow, - the arrow setting for this link.
Returns:
com.compendium.core.datamode.ILink, the link object.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
